author: felicity
msg: bug 1773: add an ENABLE_SSL option to Makefile.PL to be able to turn on
or off (default) SSL support.  instead of sslspamc, it's now "spamc -S"
which is only valid if ENABLE_SSL is set to on.

author: felicity
msg: bug 1780: we shouldn't call create_default_prefs if the dont_copy_prefs
option is set since create_default_prefs will consider that a failure

author: felicity
msg: bug 2054: some unlinks could fail without spitting out a warning due to undef values.

author: duncf
msg: added script to check rule length and other misc stuff
